title: Cloud DevOps using Microsoft Azure
description: Learn to develop and deploy cloud-based applications on Microsoft Azure, the cloud services platform used by 95 of Fortune 500 companies.

original_data.Title: Cloud DevOps using Microsoft Azure
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to develop and deploy cloud-based applications on Microsoft Azure, the cloud services platform used by 95% of Fortune 500 companies.
original_data.Prequisites: Intermediate Python, familiarity with Linux shell scripting and cloud concepts.
original_data.What you learn: Microsoft Azure is one of the most popular cloud services platforms used by enterprises, making it a crucial tool for cloud computing professionals to add to their skillset. The Cloud DevOps using Microsoft Azure Nanodegree program teaches students how to deploy, test, and monitor cloud applications on Azure, thereby preparing learners for success on Microsoft’s AZ-400 DevOps Engineer Expert certification exam.

title: Getting Started with AI using IBM Watson
description: In this course you will learn how to quickly and easily get started with Artificial Intelligence using IBM Watson. You will understand how Watson works, become familiar with its use cases and real life client examples, and be introduced to several of Watson AI services from IBM that enable anyone to easily apply AI and build smart apps. You will also work with several Watson services to demonstrate AI in action.

The Cloud Developer using Microsoft Azure Nanodegree program teaches students how to deploy, build, migrate, and monitor applications on Azure, thereby preparing learners for success on Microsoft’s AZ-204 Azure Developer Associate Expert certification.

original_data.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for Azure AI engineers and learn to design, build, and implement machine learning models, using Microsoft Azure.
original_data.Prequisites: Python, Microsoft Azure, JSON and REST programming semantics.
original_data.What you learn: You’ll master the skills necessary to implement machine learning models, design and build an end-to-end AI solution with Azure Cognitive Services, and deploy, monitor, and manage continuous improvement of an Azure AI solution. By the end of the program, you’ll be an ideal candidate for Microsoft certification A1-102.

title: Applying Data Analytics in Accounting
description: This course explores business analytic applications in accounting. First, it presents a survey of technology topics in accounting, including process mining, blockchain and applications in audit, tax, and assurance. Next, the course explores visualization and basic analytics in audit and control testing using R and Alteryx. Next, the course examines the uses of text analysis in accounting and conducts text analysis using R and RStudio. Finally, the course examines robot process automation in general using UiPath and its applications in accounting.

original_data.Title: Applying Data Analytics in Accounting
original_data.Short Intro: This course explores business analytic applications in accounting. First, it presents a survey of technology topics in accounting, including process mining, blockchain and applications in audit, tax, and assurance. Next, the course explores visualization and basic analytics in audit and control testing using R and Alteryx. Next, the course examines the uses of text analysis in accounting and conducts text analysis using R and RStudio. Finally, the course examines robot process automation in general using UiPath and its applications in accounting.
original_data.Skills: Natural Language Processing,robotic process automation,Analytics,Data Analysis,Accounting Analytics,
original_data.Instructors: Gies College of Business, University of Illinois

title: Become an AWS Cloud Architect
description: Lead your organizations cloud computing strategy as an AWS Cloud Architect. Plan, design, and build secure, high availability cloud infrastructure.

original_data.Title: Become an AWS Cloud Architect
original_data.Short Intro: Lead your organization's cloud computing strategy as an AWS Cloud Architect. Plan, design, and build secure, high availability cloud infrastructure.
original_data.Prequisites: Experience with Cloud Computing, Programming, and AWS.
original_data.What you learn: Play a critical role in an organization’s cloud computing strategy as an AWS Cloud Architect. Learn to plan, design, and implement secure cloud infrastructure in AWS at scale. Begin by designing and building high availability infrastructure, and then move on to building scalable, secure, and cost-optimized architecture. Finally, explore and execute best practices and strategies around securing access to cloud services and infrastructure.

title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials
description: Welcome to AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials. If youre new to the cloud, whether youre in a technical or non-technical role such as finance, legal, sales, marketing, this course will provide you with an understanding of fundamental AWS Cloud concepts to help you gain confidence to contribute to your organizations cloud initiatives. This course is also the starting point to prepare for your AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification whenever its convenient for you.

This course is also the starting point to prepare for your AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification whenever it’s convenient for you.

title: Modernizing Data Lakes and Data Warehouses with Google Cloud
description: The two key components of any data pipeline are data lakes and warehouses. This course highlights use-cases for each type of storage and dives into the available data lake and warehouse solutions on Google Cloud in technical detail. Also, this course describes the role of a data engineer, the benefits of a successful data pipeline to business operations, and examines why data engineering should be done in a cloud environment.

title: AWS SysOps Associate Certification Training
description: Get hands-on exposure to the highly scalable Amazon Web Services AWS cloud platform with the AWS SysOps Associate certification training program. This course will help you attain valuable technical expertise in deploying, managing, and operating fault-tolerant systems on AWS.

original_data.Title: AWS SysOps Associate Certification Training
original_data.Short Intro: Get hands-on exposure to the highly scalable Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud platform with the AWS SysOps Associate certification training program. This course will help you attain valuable technical expertise in deploying, managing, and operating fault-tolerant systems on AWS.

title: AWS Solutions Architect Certification Training Course
description: AWS certification training course is essential for every aspiring AWS-certified solutions architect. You will master AWS architectural principles and services such as IAM, VPC, EC2, EBS and elevate your career to the cloud, and beyond with this AWS course.

original_data.Title: AWS Solutions Architect Certification Training Course

title: Become a CBRS Certified Professional Installer by Google
description: This six-module program, developed by Google, will train you to be a Certificated Professional Installer CPI of radios which utilize the Citizens Broadband Radio Service CBRS band to provide communications infrastructure. You can expect to leave this training with the skills you need to get started as a Certified Professional Installer.

original_data.Title: Become a CBRS Certified Professional Installer by Google
original_data.Short Intro: This six-module program, developed by Google, will train you to be a Certificated Professional Installer (CPI) of radios which utilize the Citizens Broadband Radio Service (CBRS) band to provide communications infrastructure. You can expect to leave this training with the skills you need to get started as a Certified Professional Installer.

title: Google Data Analytics Capstone: Complete a Case Study
description: This course is the eighth course in the Google Data Analytics Certificate. Youll have the opportunity to complete an optional case study, which will help prepare you for the data analytics job hunt. Case studies are commonly used by employers to assess analytical skills. For your case study, youll choose an analytics-based scenario. Youll then ask questions, prepare, process, analyze, visualize and act on the data from the scenario. Youll also learn other useful job hunt skills through videos with common interview questions and responses, helpful materials to build a portfolio online, and more. Current Google data analysts will continue to instruct and provide you with hands-on ways to accomplish common data analyst tasks with the best tools and resources.

original_data.Title: Google Data Analytics Capstone: Complete a Case Study
original_data.Short Intro: This course is the eighth course in the Google Data Analytics Certificate. You’ll have the opportunity to complete an optional case study, which will help prepare you for the data analytics job hunt. Case studies are commonly used by employers to assess analytical skills. For your case study, you’ll choose an analytics-based scenario. You’ll then ask questions, prepare, process, analyze, visualize and act on the data from the scenario. You’ll also learn other useful job hunt skills through videos with common interview questions and responses, helpful materials to build a portfolio online, and more. Current Google data analysts will continue to instruct and provide you with hands-on ways to accomplish common data analyst tasks with the best tools and resources.
original_data.Skills: Job portfolio,Data Cleansing,Data Analysis,Data Visualization (DataViz),case study,

original_data.Prequisites: Experience with SQL, Python, Azure, and Github.
original_data.What you learn: Learners will acquire the skills needed to design data models, create data pipelines, and navigate large datasets on the Azure platform. Additionally, they will learn to build data warehouses, data lakes, and lakehouse architecture.
